content:
Yes, badminton is a very popular sport in Asia and many countries have strong players in this sport. According to the Badminton World Federation, currently, the top 5 Asian countries in men's singles badminton are:
1. China
2. Indonesia
3. Japan
4. Taiwan
5. Korea

For women's badminton singles, the top 5 countries are:
1. China
2. Japan
3. Taiwan
4. Thailand
5. Korea

Of course, this can change as players' performance fluctuates over time.
